data.title: Oando Plc
data.meta_description: Oando Plc | 402,404 followers on LinkedIn. Sub-Saharan Africa's leading energy solutions provider | Oando PLC is one of Africa’s leading energy solutions providers with a proud heritage. It has a primary listing on the Nigeria Stock Exchange and a secondary listing on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange, with shared values of Teamwork, Respect, Integrity, Passion and Professionalism (TRIPP).
data.text:
As we chart our course into a new era, the Oando team gathered for a pivotal town hall meeting at the Lagos office to discuss the exciting changes following our recent acquisition. It was a day of insightful conversations and shared visions, setting the stage for a stronger, more unified future. Together, we’re shaping the next chapter of growth and innovation. #OandoNAOCacquisition #HumansofOando

The town hall meeting at our Abuja office marked a significant moment for Oando PLC. As we delved into the implications of our recent acquisition, the discussions were focused and forward-looking. The team’s alignment and commitment were evident as we outlined strategies to navigate this new phase. Together, we are well-positioned to capitalize on emerging opportunities and drive sustainable growth. #OandoNAOCacquisition #HumansofOando

Welcoming new beginnings! The signing ceremony confirming Oando’s acquisition of NAOC marks the beginning of an exciting new chapter in our history. We are poised for greater growth and a brighter future. Join us on the journey to a new era. #OandoNAOCacquisition #OandoisNigeria

The future is full of promise, and change is the path that gets us there! Dr. Ainojie Alexander Irune (PhD) visited our Abuja office, encouraging the #humansofoando to stay open-minded, embrace the unknown, and seize the possibilities that await in this new era. #OandoNAOCacquisition #BetterTogether #ANewEra #HumansofOando

The tour of the Port Harcourt office was a fantastic opportunity for the management to meet the team and experience the vibrant workspace. This visit reaffirmed our commitment to a positive transition and highlighted our shared optimism for the exciting journey that lies ahead. Together, we will make this acquisition a great success! #OandoNAOCacquisition #BetterTogether #ANewEra #HumansofOando

Exclusive Insights: Our esteemed GCE, Adewale Tinubu reflects on the significance of the Oando NAOC acquisition and what this milestone means for the future of our company and the energy sector. #OandoNAOCacquisition #BetterTogether #ANewEra

We ended the week on a high note! At our HQ in Lagos, Nigeria, the air was filled with excitement, hope, and joy as the #HumansofOando, whose dedication and hard work made this milestone possible, celebrated. The Oando story is a testament that there are no limitations when you have an unwavering belief in your vision and work towards its actualization. Here’s to achieving greater heights. #OandoNAOCacquisition #ANewEra #Bettertogether

Reliving the moments that made history! Watch the highlights from our NAOC Ltd acquisition signing ceremony in London, where our esteemed GCE, Adewale Tinubu and Mr Guido Brusco, Chief Operating Officer, General Director of Natural Resources, Eni SpA were joined by a delegation of stakeholders and the amazing #HumansofOando to complete the #OandoNAOCacquisition transaction. #HumansofOando #OandoisNigeria #ANewEra

The #HumansofOando gathered in Abuja to celebrate the #OandoNAOCacquistion. It was a fun-filled event, centered on marking the start of an incredible new era. Watch the highlights and share in the excitement! #HumansofOando #NextLevelGrowth #OandoisNigeria

#ICYMI: Here are the highlights from the recent signing ceremony confirming Oando’s 100% acquisition of NAOC Ltd. The successful conclusion of this acquisition enhances our portfolio and underscores our commitment to driving innovation and excellence in the energy industry. Here's to a promising future! #OandoNAOCacquisition #HumansofOando
